fixes.name: Dynamic Age Group
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR AgeNum = VALUE('test+'[Age])
RETURN IF(AgeNum <= SELECTEDVALUE('Age Cut Value'[Display As]), "Young", "Adult")
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Age Cut Value'[Display As]) per parameter rules. Converted the row-level 'Age' (stored as string) to a number using VALUE() before comparison. Implemented the IF logic in DAX and returned string literals "Young"/"Adult".
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Age Cut Value]), and per rules any parameter-based calculation must be created as a measure.
